name: Catan VR
description: Catan VR allows tabletop fans and new players alike to experience the best-selling board game in a fresh, fully-immersive format. Take on other players around the world or play against Catan personalities and watch the island come to life in VR for the first time.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 2450 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8.1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2450 MB available space
